hero.title: Welcome to GlobalTrustHub
hero.subtitle: Where Indian Quality Meets the World.
hero.description1: At GlobalTrustHub, we are dedicated to connecting the finest Indian products with customers across the globe. Our mission is to showcase the rich heritage, craftsmanship, and natural bounty of India through our premium exports. Whether it's nutrient-rich Makhana from Bihar, exquisite handwoven textiles, or authentic handicrafts, we ensure every product reflects our commitment to quality and trust.
hero.description2: As a new and passionate team in the export industry, we may be at the beginning of our journey, but our dedication to customer satisfaction and ethical business practices is unwavering. We believe in building lasting relationships and delivering value with every shipment.
hero.description3: Discover our range of products and experience the best of India—exported with care, integrity, and a personal touch.

freshPerspective.title: Fresh Perspective
freshPerspective.description: As a new company, we bring energy, innovation, and a modern approach to every partnership.

honestyDedication.title: Honesty & Dedication
honestyDedication.description: We may not have decades of experience, but we make up for it with honesty, hard work, and a genuine desire to deliver value.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Your trust means everything to us. We listen, adapt, and go the extra mile to ensure your satisfaction at every step.

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: We never compromise on quality. Every product is carefully selected and tested to meet international standards.

trustTransparency.title: Trust & Transparency
trustTransparency.description: Building lasting relationships through honest communication and transparent business practices.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to understanding and exceeding your expectations.

getInTouch.title: Ready to Connect?
getInTouch.description: Have questions or want to start your export journey? Reach out to us and our team will get back to you promptly.

hero.title: About GlobalTrustHub
hero.subtitle: Building bridges between Indian excellence and global opportunities

companyStory.title: The Heart of Our Mission
companyStory.description1: Founded with a vision to showcase India's finest products to the world, GlobalTrustHub began as a small family business with big dreams. Today, we're proud to be a trusted bridge connecting Indian artisans and producers with global markets.
companyStory.description2: Our journey started with a simple belief: quality speaks a universal language. From the pristine wetlands of Bihar where our premium Makhana is harvested, to the skilled workshops where our handicrafts are lovingly created, we ensure every product tells a story of excellence.
companyStory.description3: Every piece tells a story of dedication, tradition, and hope,
companyStory.description4: Aryan often says. We realized that behind every pair of skilled hands is a family, a community, and a rich cultural heritage that deserves global recognition.
companyStory.quote: We don't just export products; we export dreams, traditions, and the skilled hands that create magic from raw materials. Every shipment carries the hopes of artisan families who trust us to showcase their work to the world.
companyStory.author: - Aryan Mittal, Founder & CEO

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To be the most trusted partner in global trade, connecting Indian excellence with international markets while maintaining the highest standards of quality, integrity, and customer satisfaction.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create a world where Indian products are recognized globally for their quality and authenticity, fostering cultural exchange and economic growth through sustainable trade practices.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: We never compromise on quality. Every product is carefully selected and tested to meet international standards.

trustTransparency.title: Trust & Transparency
trustTransparency.description: Building lasting relationships through honest communication and transparent business practices.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to understanding and exceeding your expectations.

footer.description: GlobalTrustHub is your trusted partner in premium export services, specializing in high-quality Makhana and authentic Indian handicrafts. We connect Indian excellence with global markets.

organic.title: Organic & Natural
organic.description: All our products are sourced from organic farms and natural materials

exportReady.title: Export Ready

premiumMakhana.name: Premium Makhana
premiumMakhana.description: Organic, hand-picked fox nuts from Bihar's pristine wetlands. Rich in protein, low in calories, and perfect for healthy snacking.

roastedMakhana.name: Roasted Makhana
roastedMakhana.description: Perfectly roasted fox nuts with traditional Indian spices. A healthy alternative to conventional snacks.

handwovenTextiles.name: Handwoven Textiles
handwovenTextiles.description: Exquisite handwoven textiles showcasing traditional Indian craftsmanship and vibrant colors.

brassArtifacts.name: Brass Artifacts
brassArtifacts.description: Authentic brass artifacts crafted by skilled artisans, perfect for home decoration and gifting.

woodenSculptures.name: Wooden Sculptures
woodenSculptures.description: Intricately carved wooden sculptures representing Indian mythology and cultural heritage.

ceramicPottery.name: Ceramic Pottery
ceramicPottery.description: Beautiful ceramic pottery with traditional glazes and modern designs for contemporary homes.

hero.title: Export Process
hero.subtitle: Our streamlined export process ensures quality, transparency, and timely delivery at every step.

inquiry.title: Inquiry & Quotation
inquiry.description: We receive your inquiry and provide a detailed quotation tailored to your requirements.

orderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmation
orderConfirmation.description: Once you confirm the order, we initiate the procurement and quality check process.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: All products undergo rigorous quality checks to ensure they meet international standards.

logistics.title: Logistics & Shipping
logistics.description: We handle packaging, documentation, and arrange safe, timely shipment to your destination port.

delivery.title: Delivery & Support
delivery.description: We provide tracking, delivery updates, and post-shipment support for a seamless experience.
